Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at 74th/Racine
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses temp. rerouted via 74th, Halsted, 76th, Loomis, and 74th due to, street blockage at 74th/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 74th, Halsted, 76th, Loomis, and 74th due to, street blockage at 74th/Racine.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown and Purple Line Express Delays
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown and Purple Line Express trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Fullerton. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown and Purple Line Express trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Fullerton.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
